summary: Love among the Forsytes is strange, full of tradition, melancholy and gold digging in this film treatise on Victorian-age rigidity and vestiges of a flawed society.
cast: Errol Flynn|Greer Garson|Walter Pidgeon|Robert Young|Janet Leigh|Harry Davenport|Aubrey Mather|Gerald Oliver Smith|Lumsden Hare|Stanley Logan|Halliwell Hobbes|Matt Moore|Florence Auer|Phyllis Morris|Marjorie Eaton|Evelyn Beresford|Jimmy Aubrey|Frank Baker|Billy Bevan|Lilian Bond|Nina Borget|Leonard Carey|Constance Cavendish|André Charlot|Jack Chefe|Wallis Clark|David Dunbar|William Eddritt|Herbert Evans|Morgan Farley|Blanche Franke|Nina Garson|James Gonzalez|Gloria Gordon|Marion Gray|Sam Harris|Jimmy Hawkins|Timmy Hawkins|Leyland Hodgson|Olaf Hytten|Colin Kenny|Richard Lupino|Charles McNaughton|Renee Mercer|George Nardelli|Albert Petit|Norman Rainey|Isabel Randolph|Jean Ransome|Rolfe Sedan|John Sheffield|Reginald Sheffield|Gabrielle Windsor|Wilson Wood
title: La dinastía de los Forsyte
